attributes.action: refuse to replace the Red Ensign of the Merchant Navy with an EU alternative.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU wants to replace the Red Ensign of the British Merchant fleet with an EU alternative. This replacement is not necessary; it also a betrayal of the memory of the merchant seaman who died thoughouth the 20th century under the Red Ensign.

rejection.details: The premise of the petition is false.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
